tailwind.config.js.description: Teaouse design system colors are: tea-green (#7FAE5A), warm-wood (#8B5A2B), cream-paper (#FAF6EF), ink-brown (#3A2A1F). Typography uses font-display for Playfair Display and font-accent for Caveat.

src/app/layout.tsx.description: Google Fonts configured using next/font/google with CSS custom properties: --font-playfair-display, --font-inter, --font-caveat. Font variables applied to html element className for global availability.

src/styles/globals.css.description: CSS custom properties defined for design system: --color-tea-green, --color-warm-wood, --color-cream-paper, --color-ink-brown. Typography variables: --font-heading, --font-body, --font-accent. Shadow variables: --shadow-soft, --shadow-card. Component classes: .contrast-btn (tea-green), .btn-primary, .btn-secondary, .card-teaouse, .card-soft. Heading classes: .heading-display, .heading-xl, .heading-lg, .heading-md.
